name: Reclining-Loveseat_Charcoal_Grey_Bonded_Leather
description: The left and right facing reclining seats joined together instantly creates a love seat. Upholstered in stylish grey bonded leather with a comfortably padded head rest, excellent lumbar support and a reclining mechanism, this set will be the perfect addition to any entertainment area. A plush seat back and sleek track arms give this set a chic modern look that is sure to enhance your living space. Ideal for movie night, reading a book or just to kick back and relax after a long day’s work, this modular motion series was designed for ultimate comfort. Finish the look with the matching swivel glider recliner to complete the set.Furniture Pattern: SolidType: Loveseat, ReclinerMaterial: Bonded Leather, Foam, WoodStyle: Contemporary, Casual, TransitionalAssembly: Assembly RequiredExact Color: CharcoalColor: GreyDimensions: 41 inches H x 52 inches W x 35 inches DStyleCasual, Contemporary, TransitionalMaterialBonded Leather, Foam, WoodTypeLoveseat, ReclinerAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorGreyFurniture PatternSolid
